channel.title: Projects on Gilles Otten's webpage
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Gilles Otten's webpage

item.title: HiRISE
item.description: Combining high contrast imaging with high dispersion spectroscopy.

item.title: MASCARA
item.description: The Multi-Site All-Sky CAmeRA searches for transiting exoplanets around the brightest stars in the sky.

item.title: vAPP coronagraph
item.description: The vector Apodizing Phase Plate coronagraph (vAPP) surpressed starlight on both sides of a star using an achromatic pupil-plane coronagraph based on liquid-crystal technology. This enables an improved detection and characterization of exoplanets and their atmospheres.

item.title: Genetic genealogy
item.description: DNA is a powerful tool in family research and has provided valuable clues in my family’s origins.

item.title: Genealogy
item.description: Otten family tree with more than 10000 relatives. Updated since the year 2000.
